dmca.title: GoogleTakes Haircut at DMCA Complaints Salon
dmca.body:
October 18, 2007 

Hi there. 
I'm writing in to file an official infringement notice; a Blogspot blog titled 'Truth At Large' (http://truthatlarge.blogspot.com/)has republished an article that is owned entirely by Salon Media Group, Inc. 
The Salon article, 'How Hillary Could Tank' was initially published on October 16, 2007 at this URL: 
http://www.salon.com/news/feature/2007/6/hillary 10/ 
The infringing article has a publication date of October 16,2007 and is located here: http://truthatlarge.blogspot.com/2007/ I 0/how-hillary-could-tank.htrnl
 
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing Web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 
Regards, 
[private]@salon.com 
Syndication Manager Salon Media Group, Inc 
[private]
[private]
